hero.title: Welcome to Lamb Cottage Caravan Park
hero.subtitle: Award-winning adults-only caravan park set in 7¬Ω acres of meticulously maintained lawns and landscaped grounds in the heart of Cheshire.

welcome.title: Welcome to Lamb Cottage
welcome.content: Welcome to our award-winning adults-only caravan park, set in 7¬Ω acres of meticulously maintained lawns and landscaped grounds in Cheshire's Vale Royal region. Surrounded by farmland and away from main roads, our tranquil location provides the perfect escape for a relaxing break.Our touring park is open from March until 2 January each year, offering 41 super pitches and 30 seasonal pitches. We accommodate caravans, motorhomes and privately owned holiday homes, with excellent facilities and easy access to Chester.‚úèÔ∏è

reviews.title: What Our Guests Say
reviews.subtitle: Read reviews from our satisfied guests

items.name: Sarah & John M.
items.title: Perfect peaceful getaway
items.comment: Absolutely loved our stay at Lamb Cottage. The facilities were spotless, the staff were friendly, and the location is perfect for exploring Cheshire. We'll definitely be back!

items.name: David & Margaret T.
items.title: Excellent facilities
items.comment: The shower facilities are like a luxury hotel! Everything is so clean and well-maintained. The adults-only policy makes it so peaceful and relaxing.

items.name: Robert & Linda K.
items.title: Beautiful countryside location
items.comment: What a gem! Beautiful countryside setting, excellent facilities, and so convenient for visiting Chester and the surrounding area. Highly recommended.

about.title: About Lamb Cottage Caravan Park
about.description: Learn about our family-run caravan park and our commitment to providing exceptional countryside holidays.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Discover the story behind Lamb Cottage Caravan Park

introduction.title: Welcome to Lamb Cottage
introduction.content:
Welcome to Lamb Cottage Caravan Park, a peaceful adults-only retreat set in 7¬Ω acres of beautiful countryside in Cheshire. Our family-run park has been welcoming guests since 2003, providing a tranquil escape where you can reconnect with nature and create lasting memories.

Whether you're looking for a weekend getaway or an extended holiday, our well-maintained facilities and friendly atmosphere ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay for all our guests.

awards.title: Awards & Recognition
awards.content:
We are proud to have received recognition for our commitment to excellence:

  • AA 5 Pennant Award - Recognizing our outstanding facilities and service standards
  • Visit England 5 Star Rating - Awarded for exceptional quality and guest experience
  • David Bellamy Conservation Award - Gold level recognition for our environmental conservation efforts

These awards reflect our dedication to maintaining the highest standards while caring for our natural environment.

facilities.title: Our Facilities
facilities.content:
Our park features 40 generously sized pitches, each with electric hook-up and many with hardstanding. We offer:

  • Spacious Pitches: Large, well-maintained pitches suitable for caravans, motorhomes, and tents
  • Modern Amenities: Clean, heated shower blocks with hot water and hairdryers
  • Laundry Facilities: Washing machines, tumble dryers, and ironing facilities
  • Wi-Fi Access: Complimentary wireless internet throughout the park
  • Chemical Disposal: Convenient waste disposal points

management.title: Personal Service
management.content:
Lamb Cottage Caravan Park is personally managed by the owners, ensuring that every guest receives individual attention and care. We believe in the personal touch that makes your stay special - from your arrival to departure, we're here to ensure you have everything you need for a perfect countryside holiday.

Our hands-on approach means we can quickly respond to any needs and continuously improve our facilities based on guest feedback.

contact.title: Contact Lamb Cottage Caravan Park
contact.description: Get in touch with us for bookings, enquiries, or any questions about your stay.

content.introduction: We pride ourselves on maintaining excellent five-star facilities to ensure your stay is comfortable and enjoyable. All our facilities are regularly maintained and cleaned to the highest standards.

shower_facilities.description: Our modern, heated shower blocks feature:
features: Individual shower cubicles with privacy locks

connectivity.title: Wi-Fi & Connectivity
features: Strong signal coverage across all pitches
No time limits or data restrictions

additional_amenities.title: Additional Amenities
features: Fresh water taps throughout the site
Electric hook-up on every pitch (16 amp)
Information boards with local area details

attractions.title: Local Attractions Near Lamb Cottage
attractions.description: Explore the wonderful attractions and activities available in our local area.

hero.title: Local Attractions
hero.subtitle: Discover the beauty of our surrounding area

content.introduction: Our location in Cheshire provides easy access to numerous attractions and activities. From historic sites to natural beauty spots, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

items.name: Beeston Castle
items.description: Spectacular 13th-century castle ruins with panoramic views across the Cheshire Plain

items.name: Chester Cathedral
items.description: Beautiful medieval cathedral with stunning architecture and peaceful gardens

items.name: Chester Roman Walls
items.description: Walk the most complete city walls in Britain, dating back to Roman times

items.name: Chester Zoo
items.description: One of the UK's most popular zoos with over 35,000 animals and beautiful gardens

items.name: Delamere Forest
items.description: Perfect for walking, cycling, and outdoor activities with marked trails and visitor center

items.name: Tatton Park
items.description: Historic mansion, gardens, and deer park with events throughout the year

items.name: Chester Rows
items.description: Unique covered galleries with shops, restaurants, and cafes in medieval buildings

items.name: Northwich Town Center
items.description: Local shops, supermarkets, restaurants, and essential services

items.name: Cheshire Oaks Designer Outlet
items.description: Premium outlet shopping with over 145 stores and restaurants

items.name: River Weaver Navigation
items.description: Scenic waterway perfect for walking, cycling, and boat trips

items.name: Sandstone Trail
items.description: Long-distance footpath offering beautiful countryside walks and stunning views

items.name: Vale Royal Golf Club
items.description: 18-hole championship golf course set in beautiful Cheshire countryside

content.introduction: Don't just take our word for it - see what our guests have to say about their stays with us.
content.testimonials_info: We're proud of the positive feedback we receive and continuously strive to exceed expectations.
content.review_policy: All reviews are from verified guests who have stayed at our park.

staticCaravans.description: Own your own piece of paradise with our selection of quality static caravans for sale.

content.introduction: Perfect for visitors considering retirement from touring or seeking a more permanent leisure retreat, Lamb Cottage offers a small, exclusive development of luxury static caravans for private ownership.

licensing_info.title: Licensing & Usage
licensing_info.usage_period: Licensed for use 10 months of the year (1 March ‚Äì 2 January)
licensing_info.policy: Adults-only development to ensure a tranquil environment
licensing_info.setting: Spacious pitches with private parking and meticulously maintained lawns

features_amenities.title: Premium Features
features_amenities.infrastructure: Underground piped gas eliminates the need for visible gas bottles
features_amenities.construction: Galvanised chassis with 10-year warranty, robust wall construction, steel roof
features_amenities.interior: LED lighting, uPVC windows, thick insulation, central heating, high ceilings
features_amenities.luxury_features: Luxury furnishings and integrated kitchen appliances

costs_fees.title: Costs & Fees
costs_fees.pitch_fees: Annual pitch fees include VAT, rates, water and grounds maintenance
costs_fees.utilities: Gas and electricity are metered and invoiced annually
costs_fees.payment_terms: Fees payable over ten monthly instalments

details: Electric hook-up included in all prices
Dogs welcome - ¬£2.00 per dog per night
Awnings included at no extra charge
Weekly discounts available for stays of 7 nights or more

booking_terms.title: Booking Terms
details: Minimum stay of 2 nights during peak periods
Deposit required at time of booking
Cancellation policy applies - please see terms and conditions

directions.title: Directions to Lamb Cottage Caravan Park
directions.description: Find us easily with detailed directions and travel information to Lamb Cottage Caravan Park.

hero.title: Find Us
hero.subtitle: Easy directions to your countryside retreat

content.introduction: Lamb Cottage Caravan Park is conveniently located just over one mile off the A556 dual carriageway at Sandiway, making us easily accessible from major motorways while maintaining our peaceful countryside setting.

location_details.main_access: Just over 1 mile off the A556 dual carriageway at Sandiway
location_details.entrance_description: Look for our entrance on the right between a white house and a white bungalow

from_m6_j19.title: From M6 Junction 19
from_m6_j19.instructions: Take the A556 towards Northwich and turn left at traffic lights into Dalefords Lane. Proceed for just over a mile - the entrance is on the right between a white house and a white bungalow.

from_m56_j10.title: From M56 Junction 10 and A49 Northbound
from_m56_j10.instructions: Follow the A49 south and turn left onto the A556, then turn right at traffic lights into Dalefords Lane. Continue just over a mile - the entrance is on the right.

from_a49_south.title: From A49 Southbound
from_a49_south.instructions: Turn right onto the A556 and then right again at traffic lights into Dalefords Lane. The entrance is just over a mile along on the right.

arrival_info.title: Arrival Information
arrival_info.check_in: Please report to reception upon arrival during office hours
arrival_info.late_arrival: Latest arrival time is 8:00 PM - please contact us if arriving later

helpful_tips.title: Helpful Tips
helpful_tips.landmarks: Look for the white house and white bungalow - we're between them
helpful_tips.road_name: Our address is on Dalefords Lane - watch for the road sign
helpful_tips.distance: It's just over a mile from the A556 traffic lights to our entrance

content.update_info: We regularly update our gallery with new photos throughout the seasons.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions - Lamb Cottage Caravan Park
terms.description: Read our park rules and booking conditions for a safe and enjoyable stay.

content.introduction: To ensure all guests have a safe and enjoyable stay, we have established the following park rules and booking conditions. Please read these carefully before making your booking.

park_policy.title: Park Policy
park_policy.adults_only: Lamb Cottage Caravan Park operates an adults-only policy. The park is restricted to guests over 18 years of age.

deposits.standard: A ¬£30 non-refundable deposit is required for all bookings
deposits.bank_holidays: ¬£60 deposit required for bank holiday bookings
deposits.single_nights: Single-night stays must be paid in full at time of booking

minimum_stays.easter_christmas: Minimum stay of 4 nights for Easter and Christmas/New Year periods
minimum_stays.bank_holidays: Minimum stay of 3 nights for other bank holidays

cancellation.policy: Deposits are non-refundable but may be transferred to a new booking within six months
cancellation.notice_period: At least 28 days' notice must be given for booking transfers
cancellation.covid_policy: During health crises, bookings can be moved free of charge if cancellations are due to restrictions or symptoms. Full refunds offered if the park must close.

arrival_departure.title: Arrival & Departure
arrival_departure.arrival_times: Arrivals permitted from 1:00 PM onwards (not before)
arrival_departure.departure_time: Pitches must be vacated by 12:00 noon on departure day

dogs.policy: Only quiet, non-aggressive dogs are accepted
dogs.requirements: Dogs must be kept on a lead at all times and cleaned up after
dogs.restrictions: Dogs are not allowed on the veranda around the toilet block

visitors.limit: Up to two day visitors per pitch (all over 18)
visitors.parking: Visitors must park in the designated visitors' car park
visitors.departure: All visitors must leave by 9:30 PM

smoking.policy: No smoking on the veranda or in any park buildings
smoking.enforcement: Violators may be asked to leave without refund

general_rules.vehicles: No commercial or lettered vehicles permitted
general_rules.washing: No washing of cars or caravans (except seasonal pitches) - no hosepipes allowed
general_rules.laundry: No washing lines or rotary airers - only hook-on window airers permitted
general_rules.bbq: BBQs must not be placed directly on grass areas

management_rights.title: Management Rights
management_rights.policy: Management reserves the right to refuse admission or terminate stays due to unacceptable conduct, without refund.

accessibility.title: Access Statement
accessibility.description: Information to help visitors determine if Lamb Cottage suits their accessibility needs.

hero.title: Accessibility Information
hero.subtitle: We're committed to providing clear information about our facilities to help you plan your visit.

content.introduction: This access statement provides detailed information about our facilities and terrain to help visitors determine if Lamb Cottage Caravan Park suits their accessibility needs.

terrain_layout.title: Park Layout & Terrain
terrain_layout.roads_paths: Roads, paths and pitch hardstanding areas are gravel
terrain_layout.grass_areas: Other areas are grass, and the park is mostly level
terrain_layout.general_access: The park terrain is generally level throughout

utilities_connectivity.title: Utilities & Connectivity
utilities_connectivity.mobile_reception: Mobile reception is very good on Vodafone but can be patchy on other networks
utilities_connectivity.wifi_tv: Wi-Fi and TV reception are generally good
utilities_connectivity.lighting: Low-level lighting between dusk and dawn

reception_office.title: Reception Office
reception_office.access: Approached via five paved steps with handrails
reception_office.information: Large-print information sheets available on request

pitch_facilities.title: Pitch Facilities
pitch_facilities.caravan_pitches: Each caravan pitch has an electric point, water tap and grey-waste drain on gravel hardstanding with a lawn
pitch_facilities.motorhome_pitches: Motorhome pitches are level gravel with shared water point

amenity_building.title: Amenity Building Access
amenity_building.building_access: The amenity building is raised and reachable by steps or a 1-in-12 ramp
amenity_building.disabled_suite: The disabled suite is a wet room equipped with grab handles, non-slip wash stool and an emergency alarm
amenity_building.facilities_height: Dishwashing and laundry facilities are at standard height
amenity_building.coin_machines: Coin machines for appliances are above the worktops - assistance is available
amenity_building.information_shed: An information shed provides maps and tourist leaflets

assistance_available.title: Assistance Available
assistance_available.staff_help: Our staff are happy to provide assistance with coin machines and other facilities
assistance_available.information_formats: Large-print information sheets available on request
assistance_available.contact: Please contact us in advance if you have specific accessibility requirements
